app.connectionFailed: The connection to the server is not functioning properly, and you can no longer receive consultation requests. If the issue persists, please refresh your page.

chat.textMessagesOnlySentToPatientWarning: In the case of a teleconsultation with a patient, the messages and attachments sent here are only visible to the patient for confidentiality reasons
chat.yourBrowserDoesNotSupportTheAudioElement: Your browser does not support the audio element.
chat.needAccess: We need access to your microphone to continue the call. Please allow microphone access.
chat.transferOwnershipQuestion: Are you sure you want to take ownership of this consultation?

consultations.share: Share invite by Email or mobile phone

consultation.anotherDoctorInCall: Another doctor is currently in a call
consultation.callError: Unable to initiate call, server returned
consultation.selfCallNotAllowed: Cannot make a call: You are assigned as both doctor and requester in this consultation. Please assign a different user to one of the roles.
consultation.cameraNotAccessible: Your camera is not accessible. Do you want to continue without video call without your camera?
consultation.rescheduleSuccess: Consultation rescheduled successfully. Patient will be notified.
consultation.rescheduleError: Failed to reschedule consultation. Please try again.
consultation.notFoundOrClosed: This consultation was not found or has been closed.
consultation.notFoundOrClosedMessage: The consultation you are looking for may have been closed, deleted, or you may not have permission to access it.

dashboard.consultationsListAwaitingToBeClosedOrCom: Consultations list awaiting to be closed or completed

cgu.pleaseAccept: You have to accept {{terms}} before you can use {{branding}}
cgu.notConfigured: Terms and conditions have not yet been configured.

forgotPassword.fillUpYourEmailAddressBellow: Fill up your email address bellow and when will send you a link to update your password.
forgotPassword.ifTheEmailProvidedExistsInOurDatabase: If the email provided exists in our database, you will receive a message containing a link in order to update your password.
forgotPassword.pleaseProvideAValidEmail: Please provide a valid email address

inviteForm.cantUpdateAcceptedInvite: You cannot edit invite if it has been already accepted by a patient, translation or guest.
inviteForm.patientTeleConsultationDescription: Send an invitation link to a patient to conduct a teleconsultation. You can also send an invitation to an Interpreter, Family member or Other caregiver
inviteForm.thirdPartyConsultation: Patient in person - Invitation to a third party
inviteForm.thirdPartyConsultationDescription: The patient is in a face-to-face consultation. Send an invitation link to an Interpreter, Family member or Other caregiver
inviteForm.consultationWillBeOnPremise: The consultation will be carried out with the patient in person.
inviteForm.sendLinkManually: I want to send the link manually
inviteForm.pleaseOnlyFillUpAnEmailOrAnMobilePhoneNu: Please enter only email or mobile number (+41 or +33)
inviteForm.pleaseEnterValidEmailOrPhoneNumber: Please enter an email or mobile number in the format +41 or +33
inviteForm.pleaseOnlyFillUpAnEmailOrAnMobilePhoneNu: Please fill in only one  email or mobile number.
inviteForm.warningTranslatorMightBeLate: The interpreter may respond from a less suitable location if the request is made less than 24 hours in advance.
inviteForm.notPermitted: This phone number is not permitted to be used on this platform.
inviteForm.inviteLovedOneOrProfessional: Invite a loved one or another caregiver
inviteForm.patientInvitationWillBeAfterTranslatorIs: No invitation will be sent to the patient or relatives until an interpreter has validated the invitation.
inviteForm.atLeastInviteGuestOrTranslator: You must invite at least a third party. To invite an interpreter, please change the patient's language.

overlay.theConsultationWillBeDisplayedIntoHistor: The consultation will be displayed into history during 24 hours and you will not be able to communication anymore
overlay.youWillbeAbleToResumeTheConsultationLate: You will be able to resume the consultation later but the nurse or the patient will not able to communite with you anymore.
overlay.areYouSatisfiedWithTheHomeApp: Are you satisfied with the {{branding}}  app?
overlay.doYouWantToLeaveUsAComment: Do you want to leave us a comment?

invitations.title: INVITATIONS
invitations.sendAgainTheSMSOrEmailInvite: Send again the SMS or Email invite
invitations.confirmResend: Are you sure you want to resend the invitation? The invitation will be resent the way it was sent originally using the same channel. This action also resets expired invitations.
invitations.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke and delete this invitation? No message will be sent to the patient.

planConsultation.whenWillYouBeAvailable: When will you be available for consultation?
planConsultation.maxDelay: Delay can't be longer than 60 minutes

profileUpdate.pleaseFillUpThePhoneNumberWithFormat: Please fill up the phone number with format +41XX...
profileUpdate.pleaseOnlyFillUpAnEmailOrAnMobilePhoneNu: Please only fill up an Email or an mobile phone number

profile.name: Name
profile.enablesNotification: This enables notification when an new consultation is requested.

resetPassword.youAreOnThisPage: You are on this page because you followed a link use to update your password. Please fill up your new password bellow.
resetPassword.yourPasswordHasBeenUpdated: Your password has been updated. Please go back to login page to use your new password.
resetPassword.theBothPasswordAreNotTheSame: The both password are not the same
resetPassword.yourTokenHasExpired: Your token has expired. Please request an new one.
resetPassword.anUnknownErrorHasBeenEncountered: An unknown error has been encountered. Please try again.

testMedia.aProperlyTuned: A properly tuned microphone should put the VU meter in the green center area when speaking.

sendInviteLink.title: Invite by link
sendInviteLink.subTitle: Copy the link bellow and share with the patient with your preferred way. Warning, this link is usable only one time.
sendInviteLink.label: Invite link
sendInviteLink.sent: The invite link has been sent successfully to participant

tour.invitesMenuContent: Invites allow patients to join you on this application. Create or revoke invites at any time from this area.
tour.newInviteButtonContent: Click 'New Invite' to open the form.
tour.remotePatientInviteContent: Click on 'Remote patient' so patient can join you on this application.
tour.inviteFormContactInputContent: Fill in the patient's information to easily recognize which patient is waiting for a remote consultation. You can send the invite link via SMS, email, or WhatsApp, depending on the software configuration and the patient's country.
tour.inviteFormSendLinkManuallyContent: If you prefer to share the link with your patient manually, check this box. After sending, you will be able to copy the link and share it (e.g., in an email you write yourself). Be careful not to use the link yourself to test it, as the link is usable only once.
tour.waitingRoomMenuContent: Once your patient has used the link and requested to join the consultation, you will be notified with a sound and see the incoming patient in this queue. Keep the application open to reduce the risk of missing a consultation.
tour.openedConsultationsMenuContent: Once you have handled a consultation, you can choose to keep it open so your patient can continue communicating with you and sending messages. You can view such consultations in this section.
tour.consultationsHistoryMenuContent: When you decide to close a consultation, your patient will no longer be able to exchange messages with you. The consultation will remain in this history for 24 hours before being deleted from the system for security reasons.
tour.headerProfileMenuContent: You can manage some information from your profile page.
tour.startTourDescription: {{branding}} helps you connect with patients. This tour will help you understand the concept. You can skip the tour at any time by closing this help.
tour.endTourDescription: You can change the language or enable SMS notifications in case something happens when you are not connected to this application.

error.defaultMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.blockedMessage: Your request was blocked by a security policy. Please contact support if the problem persists.
error.networkMessage: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

forbidden.title: Access Forbidden
forbidden.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

webviewWarning.title: Browser Not Supported
webviewWarning.message: Video calls are not supported in this browser.
webviewWarning.description: Copy the link below and open it in Safari or Chrome:
webviewWarning.urlCopied: URL copied! Open Safari or Chrome and paste the link.
